fields.name: folder
fields.label: Filter by Folder
fields.description: Filter results to show only pages from this folder path (e.g., /products or /blog). Leave empty to show all results. You can specify multiple folders separated by commas (e.g., /products, /blog).

fields.name: enableTagFilter
fields.label: Enable Tag Filter
fields.description: Show tag filter buttons based on page tags in search results. Users can filter results by clicking on tag pills.

fields.name: multipleTagSelect
fields.label: Allow Multiple Tag Selection
fields.description: When enabled, users can select multiple tags to filter results. When disabled, only one tag can be selected at a time.

fields.name: searchPlaceholder
fields.label: Search Placeholder
fields.description: Placeholder text shown in the search input field. Default: 'Search...'

fields.name: searchNoResultsFor
fields.label: No Results For Query
fields.description: Message shown in the count area when no results are found, followed by the search query. Default: 'No results found for'

fields.name: searchResultsTitle
fields.label: Search Results Title
fields.description: Title shown above the search results. Default: 'Search Results'
